author: mmusich
body:
backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49769

#### PR description:

This PR is based upon the update of the `Run3ScoutingHBHERecHit` scouting data format introduced at https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49718.
The purpose is to add monitoring of the HBHE scouting rechit time in the dedicated online / offline scouting DQM

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles, run successfully `runTheMatrix.py -l 16834.0 -t 4 -j 8`.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Verbatim backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49769 for 2026 data-taking operations.
title: Introduce DQM for `Run3ScoutingHBHERecHit` time [16.0.X]
